How was the covariate defined?: Charlson index implemented using Read code lists. (2) Code lists based on those by Taylor et al. (3)
2010 English Index of Multiple Deprivation (IMD) at the twentile level, where 1 represents the least deprived and 20 the most deprived.
Calculated by dividing the total number of clinic visits by the length of the patient record prior to the index date to give an average annual rate.
Most recent of recorded value (current, former or never) or Read code indicating a recorded value. Code lists based on those by Wright et al. (4)

Recorded value if available, or a calculated value using the last recorded height and weight measurements. Measurements taken before the age of 25 were excluded to ensure adult measurements were used.
